name: Iron Lump
description: A lump of iron, useful for smithing.
notes: Basic smithing material obtained from mining iron ore and smelting.

name: Small Anvil
description: A small anvil used for smithing.
notes: Required for many smithing recipes. Quality affects success rate.

name: Large Anvil
description: A large anvil used for smithing bigger items.

name: Forge
description: A forge for smelting ore and heating metal items.
notes: Burns fuel to heat items inside. Essential for metalworking.

name: Plank
description: A wooden plank used in carpentry.
notes: Created from logs using a saw or carving knife.

name: Carving Knife
description: A small knife used for fine woodworking.
notes: Versatile early-game tool. Used for carving and some crafting actions.

name: Mallet
description: A wooden mallet used in various crafting.
notes: Used for fine carpentry and improving wooden items.

name: Rope
description: A length of rope made from wemp fibre.
notes: Used in construction and ship building.

name: Large Cart
description: A large cart for transporting heavy items.
notes: Can be pulled by the player. Holds many items.

name: Pickaxe
description: A pickaxe for mining ore and rock.
notes: Essential mining tool. Quality affects mining speed and ore quality.
